00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00010 #include "strings.h"

00020 
00024 void dissectIdentifer(MavenCompiler* c, string identifier, int mode, bool& closeFunction, bool& closeClass,
00025                                           bool& closeSwitch, bool& closeWith, MavenVariable& var, string& close) {
00026         // bug #15: multiple identifiers in one like:
00027         // its easier to say that a localScope is defined by curly brackets, hence
00028         // in the case of:
00029         // for() if() { }
00030         // is still only a single localScope
00031         
00032         // bug #16: Seperately need to test for bracketless nested statements
00033         // if() if() a;
00034         identifier = trim(identifier);
00035         StringList p = splitNested(identifier);
00036         //if(p.length() == 0) return;
00037         if(p.length() > 1) {
00038                 // bug #16: which direction should this go?
00039                 for(int i = 0; i < p.length(); ++i)
00040                         dissectIdentifer(c, p[i], mode, closeFunction, closeClass, closeSwitch, closeWith, var, close);
00041                 return;
00042         }
00043         
00044         if(identifier != "") {
00045                 // get the preliminary keyword to see if we can quickly deal with it
00046                 string prelim = "";
00047                 for(int i = 0; i < identifier.length(); ++i) {
00048                         if(!isalnum(identifier[i])) break;
00049                         else prelim += identifier[i];
00050                 }
00051                 c->lastStatament = prelim;
00052                 
00053                 if(prelim == "abstract") {
00054                         StringList words = split(' ', identifier);
00055                         if(words[1] != "class") {
00056                                 pushError(c, "Keyword 'class' must follow 'abstract'");
00057                                 return;
00058                         } else {
00059                                 MavenObject* o = dissectObject(c, identifier);
00060                                 c->currentClass = o->name;
00061                                 o->isAbstract = true;
00062                                 if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_MAP)
00063                                         pushObject(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace), o);
00064                                 closeClass = true;
00065                         }
00066                 } else if(prelim == "class") {
00067                         MavenObject* o = dissectObject(c, identifier);
00068                         c->currentClass = o->name;
00069                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_MAP)
00070                                 pushObject(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace), o);
00071                         closeClass = true;
00072                 } else if(prelim == "do") {
00073                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00074                                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, "do {");
00075                                 close += "}";
00076                         }
00077                 } else if(prelim == "if") {
00078                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00079                                 keywordIf(c, identifier, close);
00080                         }
00081                 } else if(prelim == "enum") {
00082                         // nothing here
00083                 } else if(prelim == "else") {
00084                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00085                                 keywordElse(c, identifier, close);
00086                         }
00087                 } else if(prelim == "for") {
00088                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00089                                 keywordFor(c, identifier, close);
00090                         }
00091                 } else if(prelim == "while") {
00092                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00093                                 keywordWhile(c, identifier, close);
00094                         }
00095                 } else if(prelim == "try") {
00096                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00097                                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, "try {");
00098                                 close += "}";
00099                         }
00100                 } else if(prelim == "switch") {
00101                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00102                                 int actionStart;
00103                                 StringList types;
00104                                 MavenMutability mut;
00105                                 c->switchArgument = dissectCode(c, getStatementQuestion(identifier, actionStart), types, mut);
00106                                 // bug #17: check switchArgument is not invalid
00107                                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, "if(false) {");
00108                                 close += "}";
00109                                 closeSwitch = true;
00110                         }
00111                 } else if(prelim == "catch") {
00112                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00113                                 MavenVariable catchVar;
00114                                 writeAutoCPPLine(c, keywordCatch(c, identifier, catchVar) + " {");
00115                                 pushLocalScope(c, catchVar);
00116                                 close += "}";
00117                         }
00118                 } else if(prelim == "with") {
00119                         // bug #18: with() can not be nested
00120                         // bug #19: make sure object is valid
00121                         int namespaceID, objectID;
00122                         bool isLocal;
00123                         resolveVariable(c, identifier.substr(identifier.find('(') + 1, identifier.find(')') - identifier.find('(') - 1), c->withObject, namespaceID, objectID, isLocal, false);
00124                         closeWith = true;
00125                 } else if(isRegisteringFunction(c, identifier)) {
00126                         // bug #20: abc() { } looks like a function
00127                         MavenFunction func = dissectFunction(c, identifier);
00128                         c->currentFunction = func.name;
00129                         closeFunction = true;
00130                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE) {
00131                                 writeCPPLine(c, string("} namespace ") + c->currentNamespace + "{");
00132                                 writeCPPLine(c, func.getCPPLine(c, c->currentClass) + "{");
00133                                 
00134                                 // if this is a constructor we have to init the super
00135                                 if(func.name == c->currentClass)
00136                                         writeCPPLine(c, "super(\"" + c->currentNamespace + "." + c->currentClass + "\");");
00137                                 close = "}";
00138                                 
00139                                 // add arguments to localScope
00140                                 for(int i = 0; i < func.args.length(); ++i)
00141                                         pushLocalScope(c, func.args[i]);
00142                         }
00143                         
00144                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_MAP) {
00145                                 func.doc = filterDoc(c, c->doc);
00146                                 pushFunction(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace),
00147                                                          findObjectID(c, findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace), c->currentClass), func);
00148                                 c->doc = "";
00149                         }
00150                 } else if(isRegisteringVariable(c, smartTokens(identifier))) {
00151                         if(mode == MAVEN_ONLY_MAP) {
00152                                 // use the substr to take off the '=' from the end
00153                                 registerVariable(c, smartTokens(identifier.substr(0, identifier.length() - 1)), false, var);
00154                         }
00155                 } else {
00156                         pushError(c, "Unknown block identifier '%s' in '%s'", trim(prelim), identifier);
00157                         return;
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 }
